title: Hitting level 30
body: Is there any reason, that when i hit level 30, in my store the IP bundles are now disable, yet i can still purcahse XP? In what scenario would i still want to purchase XP and not want to further my IP to unlock things?

replies.body:
Coming pre-season, a bunch of things are changing. IP will be merged with blue essence as a new form of currency. All your current IP will be converted and your current blue essence amplified. To celebrate this they will also be bringing in a limited BE shop, with things like chromas and even urf warwick. IP boosts were removed at the time of the announcement (5 days ago) due to the upcoming changes. 

You can watch the Riot announcement video [HERE](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yq2i6RDmbNc) and read the TLDR [HERE](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/Zl3uceKN-upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards-major-update)
